general.multiplayer_disabled:
{Multiplayer is Disabled}

To enable Multiplayer you need to {~Cyan}remove SoD_SP} from your active mods list.
general.prison_fusion:
{Hero Fusion} is disabled.
Please move off the Prison and try again.
general.custom_abbreviation_text: Please enter between {1 and 15} characters for your custom quicksave name.

adventure_map_coordinates.description:
{Adventure map coordinates}

The color matching the coordinates of the mouse cursor on the Adventure Map.

creature_hit_points.description:
{Battle creature hit points}

The color of creature hit points under the mouse cursor during combat.

slay_all_creatures_hint_color.description:
{Maximum count}

The color used for descriptive numbers indicating that complete annihilation or restoration will occur.

slay_partial_creatures_hint_color.description:
{Partial count}

The color used for descriptive numbers indicating that only a partial kill or restoration will occur.

move_sequence_hint_color.description:
{Move sequence}

The color used in the battlefield status bar to indicate the move order of the creature under the mouse cursor.

battle_coordinates_hint_color.description:
{Battle hex coordinates}

The color matching the battle alpha-numeric coordinates under the mouse cursor while in combat.

quickspell.target_creature: Cel Szybkiego Zaklecia {%d} przypisany do {%s} na {%c%d}.
quickspell.new_creature:
Stworzenie zostalo wskrzeszone...
Czy chcesz przypisac je jako Cel Szybkiego Zaklecia {%d}?
quickspell.set_quickspell:
Cel Szybkiego Zaklecia {%d} przypisane do {%s}.
Utrzymac Cel Szybkiego Zaklecia {%d}?
quickspell.reset_target_text: Left-click to reset Quick Spell {"%d"} target.
quickspell.reset_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset Quick Spell {"%d"} target?
quickspell.select_new_quickspell: Left-click to select another Quick Spell.

find_me.search_in_shroud_text:
When turned {ON}, FindMe will find and reveal items that are hidden in the shroud.
When turned {OFF}, FindMe will only find and reveal items that you can already see.
find_me.search_in_shroud_hint: Turn on to find and reveal items in Uncharted Territory.
find_me.toggle_event_display: Click to toggle visibility of Events on the Adventure Map.

spells.fly_waterWalk: Przybyta odleglosc nawet do %d%% punktуw normalnego ruchu.
spells.sacrifice: Dodaje %d punktуw zycia dla kazdego poswiecanego stworzenia.

dialog.dialog_description: Kliknij PPM na polu by uzyskac wiecej informacji.
dialog.save_confirmation: Are you sure you want to save all changes?
dialog.save_failed:
{Warning!}

Something went wrong and data could not be saved.

month_of_the_plague.description:
{Plaga}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} zapobiega wystepowaniu miesiaca PLAGI!.

weekly_5_growth.description:
{Stworzenie tygodnia}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} wylacza losowe tygodnie z bonusem +5 do przyrostu.

fix_armorer_turret_bug.description:
{Bug Wiez strzelniczych}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} powoduje redukcje (a nie wzrost) obrazen od wiez strzelniczych dla Platnerstwa i Tarczy Powietrznej.

prevent_resource_overflow.description:
{Przepelnienie zasobуw}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} zapobiega przepelnieniu liczby zgromadzonych zasobуw (Kiedy zgromadzi sie wiecej danego zasobu niz 2,147,483,647, pojawia sie ujemna liczba dostepnego surowca).

restore_original_obstacles.description:
{Oryginalny rozklad przeszkуd}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} przywraca pierwotny rozklad przeszkуd na polu walki - nawet gdy uzywane sa opcje '{HD+}'.

restore_original_creature_split.description:
{Oryginalny podzial jednostek}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} przywraca pierwotne zasady podzialu jednostek w walkach bez udzialu wrogiego bohatera - nawet gdy uzywane sa opcje '{HD+}'.

restore_original_random_number_generator.description:
{Oryginalne RNG}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} przywraca oryginalne RNG (Random Numer Generator) - nawet gdy uzywane sa opcje '{HD+}'.

restore_original_berserk_for_ai.description:
{AI Berserk}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} przywraca oryginalne zachowanie jednostek AI gdy sa pod wplywem zaklecia Berserk - nawet gdy uzywane sa opcje '{HD+}'.

comma_formatted_resources.description:
{Format ilosci zasobуw}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} pokazuje przecinki ',' pomiedzy kazdymi trzema cyframi by poprawic czytelnosc.
{UWAGA}: W niektуrych przypadkach z powodu braku miejsca, uzywa liter K i M jako przedrostek od tysiecy i milionуw.
np. zamiast 123,456,789 zostanie wyswietlone 123,456K.

combat_rmb_ok_button.description:
{Klik PPM podczas bitwy}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} powoduje, ze w trakcie walki okna informacyjne po kliknieciu prawym klawiszem myszki nie znikaja takze dla bohatera i jednostek wroga.

show_combat_coordinates_hint.description:
{Wspуlrzedne pola walki}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} pokazuje na dolnej belce w formie alfanumerycznej koordynaty walki gdy podczas potyczki przesuwasz wskaznik myszki nad heksami.

show_creature_hit_points_hint.description:
{Punkty zycia stworzen}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} pokazuje na dolnej belce pozostale punkty zycia stworzenia, gdy podczas walki najedziesz na niego kursorem.

show_creature_move_sequence_hint.description:
{Kolejnosc ruchu}

Opcja ustawiona na {ON} podczas walki pokazuje kolejnosc ruchu stworzenia na dolnej belce w nawiasach kwadratowych [].

enable_turbo_speed.description:
{Turbo Speed}

When turned {ON}, all combat animations are faster.

correct_some_ai_cheats.description:
{AI Cheats}

When turned {ON}, the AI players can no longer cast 'Town Portal' while on Cursed Ground and the AI is blocked from casting 'Fly' if he does not have access to it in the first place.

display_extra_spell_information.description:
{Spell Info}

When turned {ON}, you will get additional information when inspecting some spells in your Spellbook.

display_mouse_map_coordinates.description:
{Map Coordinates}

When turned {ON}, the coordinates under the mouse cursor (x,y,z) in the Adventure Map will be shown in the status bar at the bottom of the screen.

hide_clone_and_elementals_casualties.description:
{Real Casualties}

When turned {ON}, Summoned Elementals and Cloned Creatures will not be appear as Battlefield Casualties.

show_quickspell_panel.description:
{Quick Spell Panel}

When turned {ON}, the left hand side of the combat screen will display an interactive panel with your set quickspells and allows customization.

show_battlequeue_panel.description:
{Battle Queue Panel}

When turned {ON}, the right hand side of the combat screen will display the upcoming move order of creatures on the battlefield.

correct_admirals_hat_bug.description:
{Admiral's Hat Bug}

When turned {ON}, removes the possibility to generate endless movement using the Admiral's Hat.

correct_some_movement_bugs.description:
{Movement Bugs}

When turned {ON}, this option fixes some movement bugs such as retreating while on a boat, castle town's lighthouse adding movement to everyone.

enable_clone_bug.description:
{Clone Bug}

When turned {ON}, this option re-enables the clone bug while using the '{HD+}' feature. While this is required for very few specific maps, recommended setting is off as crashes can occur while using this bug.

correct_earthquake_bug.description:
{Earthquake Bug}

When turned {ON}, this option fixes the earthquake bug which sometimes targeted units.

correct_repeatable_event_bug.description:
{Repeatable Event}

When turned {ON}, this option prevents you from revisiting events which were flagged as 'Cancel event after first visit' in the mapeditor.

show_ai_movement_on_minimap.description:
{AI Minimap}

When turned {ON}, you will see where AI heroes are moving on the minimap instead of the AI shield.

correct_vanishing_upgraded_stack.description:
{Vanishing Bug}

When turned {ON}, the random upgraded stack of wandering monsters will no longer be deducted from total number of creatures if the hero retreats.

ai_fast_battle_bug.description:
{AI Fast Battle Bugs}

When turned {ON}, fixes errors in AI vs AI combat.

correct_quick_combat_power_overflow.description:
{Quick Combat Overflow}

When turned {ON}, the total power and damage dealt in AI-AI quick combat will not be permitted to overflow into negative values.

ai_necromancy_fix.description:
{AI Necromancy}

When turned {ON}, AI heroes with Necromancy will raise the appropriate number of creatures instead of a single creature.

prevent_hero_fusion.description:
{Hero Fusion}

When turned {ON}, heroes are no longer allowed to occupy the same map tile - disabling trading between them and creating copies of items.

ai_magic_mirror_fix.description:
{AI Magic Mirror}

When turned {ON}, offensive spells cast by enemy heroes may be reflected at their own troops if the original target is under the effects of the {Magic Mirror} spell.

enchanters_spellcast_fix.description:
{Enchanters Cast Bug}

When turned {ON}, Enchanters will correctly consider all valid targets instead of only the first stack on each side of the battlefield; this could result in enchanters not casting otherwise valid spells.
